bill.title: Preferred provider organizations (PPO), etc.; require all types of delivery systems to register under Patient Protection Act.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 83-41-403, 83-41-405, 83-41-409, 83-41-411 And 83-41-413, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify That All Types Of Preferred Provider Organizations (ppo), Management Services Organizations (mso), Physician Hospital Organizations (pho) And Health Alliances Are Subject To The Certification Requirements Of The Patient Protection Act; To Provide Definitions; To Provide That Such Organizations Shall Comply With Certification Requirements In Addition To Other Laws; To Require The Mississippi Department Of Insurance To Issue Regulations Effective July 1, 2011, To Implement The Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare
